references.paper_title: Momentum contrast for unsupervised visual representation learning
references.reason: This paper introduces the Momentum Contrast (MoCo) framework, which is foundational to the Holistic-Local Contrastive Learning mechanism used in 2DRCL.

references.paper_title: Improved baselines with momentum contrastive learning
references.reason: This paper builds upon MoCo and provides further improvements that are relevant to the 2DRCL framework.

references.paper_title: LVIS: A dataset for large vocabulary instance segmentation
references.reason: The LVIS dataset is one of the main benchmark datasets used to evaluate the performance of 2DRCL, making it a crucial reference.

references.paper_title: Unsupervised learning of visual features by contrasting cluster assignments
references.reason: This paper introduces the SwAV method, which is related to the contrastive learning approach used in 2DRCL.

references.paper_title: DETReg: Unsupervised pretraining with region priors for object detection
references.reason: This paper presents a self-supervised pre-training method for object detection that is compared with 2DRCL in the experiments.
